channel.title: Middle 8 only (challenge)
channel.description:
I’ve never given challenges to anyone else but let’s give it a shot. -No instrument or automation restrictions -no bpm or key restrictions -do whatever you want within the middle 8 notes (default 1/16th’s) like so... https://app.auxy.co/projects/jfK18FIkCCOfd-E3L1_avw==
![image|281x500](upload://vIAaDfYi5drLTfuOTeK05rhTkPl.jpeg)
I have nothing to offer that anyone wants so the only winner is yourself getting an excuse to play with your phone.
Here’s an example: https://youtu.be/Og2rvak09dM

item.title: Middle 8 only (challenge)
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
I’ve never given challenges to anyone else but let’s give it a shot.
-No instrument or automation restrictions
-no bpm or key restrictions
-do whatever you want within the middle 8 notes (default 1/16th’s) like so… https://app.auxy.co/projects/jfK18FIkCCOfd-E3L1_avw==

I have nothing to offer that anyone wants so the only winner is yourself getting an excuse to play with your phone.

Here’s an example: https://youtu.be/Og2rvak09dM
